faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I book an appointment?
faq.a1: You can book an appointment by filling out our contact form, calling us directly, or sending an email. We recommend booking at least 2 hours in advance for the best availability.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept cash payments in ETB or USD. For VIP packages, we also accept credit cards and mobile payment methods.
faq.a3: Absolutely. We take client confidentiality extremely seriously. Your personal information and visit details are never shared with third parties or made public.
